name: 2015 ASCO annual meeting
content: The Annual Meeting brings together 30,000 oncology professionals from around the world. Educational sessions feature world-renowned faculty discussing state-of-the-art treatment modalities, new therapies, and ongoing controversies in the field. Science sessions present the latest ground-breaking research in oral and poster format. You’ll meet friends and make connections, and bring back new ideas to your practices and hospitals. Take the time to familiarize yourself with the different opportunities the Annual Meeting offers. Mark key dates on your calendar, find out about networking opportunities, and learn about the committees that develop the session content you’ll discover onsite.
